author: Jacky Wong
title: Samsung Saga Shows Korea Reform Is Going Nowhere
text:
Talk about convenient timing. Samsung’s de facto leader, Lee Jae-yong, has been released from jail, just in time to watch the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang. His father, Lee Kun-hee—still Samsung’s chairman, despite a long hospitalization—had lobbied for South Korea to host the event, after he himself was pardoned after tax-evasion conviction back in 2009.
A charming family tale—but not one investors should read with any pleasure.
...
